error_delete_at_least_one_option: For AI auto-delete, please select at least one option
delete_prompt_default:
Review rules (strictly follow):

Illegal content: Includes obvious illegal content, incitement to violence, terror, extremism, or distribution of illegal information.

Hate and attacks: Insults, discrimination, personal attacks or malicious ridicule against individuals or groups based on race, ethnicity, religion, gender, sexual orientation, disability, etc.

Severe obscenity: Contains extremely vulgar language, explicit sexual descriptions or highly disturbing violent details.

Spam and promotion: Obvious commercial advertisements unrelated to the topic, repeated posting, promotion of contact information or malicious promotional links.

Serious misinformation and fraud: Spreads officially debunked false information that may cause public harm (such as health rumors, financial scams), or attempts at fraud.

Privacy violation: Discloses others' personal information (phone numbers, addresses, ID numbers, etc.).

Malicious disruption: Purely meaningless characters, repeated content, or malicious spam intended to disrupt normal discussion.
reply_check_prompt_default:
Characteristics (all of the following must be met):

Clear intent: The question or request is clearly identifiable.

Standardized question: Belongs to common questions or standard business processes.

Stable emotion: User emotion is neutral or positive (no obvious anger/disappointment).

Complete information: Provides enough information for judgment.

Known solution: There is a preset solution or knowledge base entry.
reply_prompt_default:
Problem-solving oriented: Provide specific solutions or next steps for the problem.

Professional and friendly: Tone is polite and positive; remain calm and professional even when facing negative comments.

Call to action: When appropriate, guide customers to the next step (such as private message, contact customer service, repurchase, etc.).

Aligned with brand persona: Language style should match the brand image (e.g., friendly, professional, lively, premium).
reply_fixed_default: Thank you for your comment. Your suggestions are the cornerstone of our progress. Wish you a happy day!
elect_prompt_default:
Featuring criteria

Positive reviews: Contain concrete and detailed usage experience, effect comparison, and scenario description that can provide real reference for other potential customers.

Constructive mid-reviews: Objectively and rationally point out specific issues of the product or service, and provide feasible improvement suggestions. Such comments are highly valuable for brand growth.
